title: BRIEF-Oilex Says Gujarat High Court Lifted Stay Order Obtained By GSPC
text:
BRIEF-Oilex Says Gujarat High Court Lifted Stay Order Obtained By GSPC

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 03:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oilex Says Gujarat High Court Lifted Stay Order Obtained By GSPC Oct 21 (Reuters) - Oilex Ltd : * ANNOUNCE THAT HIGH COURT OF GUJARAT HAS LIFTED STAY ORDER OBTAINED BY GUJARAT STATE PETROLEUM CORPORATION * WITH GSPC'S SALE PROCESS NOW WELL UNDERWAY, CO LOOKS FORWARD TO RECOMMENCEMENT OF AN ACTIVE WORK PROGRAMME AT CAMBAY IN 2020

BRIEF-Oilex Says Gujarat High Court Lifted Stay Order Obtained By GSPC
description: BRIEF-Oilex Says Gujarat High Court Lifted Stay Order Obtained By GSPC
